title: Login page doesn't work on Safari
description: Users are reporting that the login form doesn't submit on Safari browsers. The submit button appears to do nothing when clicked. Console shows CORS errors related to authentication endpoint.

title: Add dark mode support
description: Implement dark mode theme toggle in user preferences. Should persist user choice in localStorage and apply appropriate color scheme across all pages.

title: Update dependencies to latest versions
description: Review and update npm packages to their latest stable versions. Focus on security updates and major version upgrades that don't introduce breaking changes.

title: Dashboard charts not loading
description: Analytics dashboard shows empty chart components. API returns data successfully but charts fail to render. Issue appears to be related to ApexCharts initialization.

title: Implement export to CSV functionality
description: Add ability to export issue list to CSV format. Should include all visible columns and respect current filters. Download should trigger automatically after generation.

title: Mobile menu doesn't close after navigation
description: On mobile devices, the hamburger menu stays open after clicking a navigation link. Users have to manually close it which impacts UX.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions
description: Implement keyboard shortcuts to improve productivity: N for new issue, / for search focus, ESC to close modals, etc. Display shortcut hints in tooltips.

title: Performance issue with large datasets
description: Issue list becomes sluggish when displaying more than 100 items. Scrolling and filtering experience noticeable lag. Need to implement virtualization or pagination.

title: Write API documentation
description: Create comprehensive API documentation for all endpoints. Include request/response examples, authentication details, and error codes. Use OpenAPI/Swagger format.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Users report not receiving email notifications for issue updates. SMTP connection appears to be working but emails are not being queued or sent.

title: Add bulk edit capabilities
description: Allow selecting multiple issues and performing batch operations: change status, update assignee, modify priority. Should include confirmation dialog for destructive actions.

title: Inconsistent date formatting across app
description: Different pages show dates in different formats. Standardize to relative time for recent items (2 hours ago) and absolute dates for older items (Jan 5, 2024).

title: Implement issue dependencies
description: Add ability to mark issues as blocking or blocked by other issues. Display dependency graph and prevent closing parent issues before children are resolved.

title: Search results show duplicate entries
description: When searching for issues, some results appear multiple times in the list. Appears to be related to case-insensitive matching logic.

title: Add activity timeline to issue details
description: Display chronological timeline of all changes made to an issue: status changes, priority updates, comments, assignee changes. Include user avatars and timestamps.
